subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Utes’ coach, Larry Krystkowiak, lights a blend of sacred plants before games to inspire his team, which is going to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 2009.
snippet: The Utes’ coach, Larry Krystkowiak, lights a blend of sacred plants before games to inspire his team, which is going to the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since 2009.
